game.name: Puzzle Car
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A minimalist and relaxing experience. Challenge yourself to move pieces to assemble a safe path for your car and collect all the items on the way, while listening to a relaxing soundtrack in a totally minimalist environment.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A minimalist and relaxing experience. Challenge yourself to move pieces to assemble a safe path for your car and collect all the items on the way, while listening to a relaxing soundtrack in a totally minimalist environment.

reviewHighlights.text: pretty neat game. not the most difficult but difficult enough. Cant seem to get the last achievement even with fully collected levels
